alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 11:32PM EST until February 27 at 6:38PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several places. At 21.5 feet, Sang Branch Road is under water at Red Lick Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 19.4 feet by early Thursday afternoon. The river will then become steady if not fall a bit by late Thursday afternoon, before rising once again Thursday evening. The river will rise above flood stage by Friday morning and continue to a crest of 28.5 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage by early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 11 AM Thursday.
